data.title: Hansal Mehta Shares Condolences For Manohar Asrani, Father of Apruva Asrani
data.meta_description: Mumbai, 10th January 2023 (NewsHelpline) -  Filmmaker Hansal Mehta pens an encouraging note for National award winner screen writer and filmmaker Apurva Asrani, known for movies such as Aligarh, Shahid and series Criminal Justice -  Behind Closed Doors,... - Social News XYZ
data.text:
Mumbai, 10th January 2023 (NewsHelpline) - Filmmaker Hansal Mehta pens an encouraging note for National award winner screen writer and filmmaker Apurva Asrani, known for movies such as Aligarh, Shahid and series Criminal Justice - Behind Closed Doors, lost his father Manohar Asrani.

Sharing the sad news about his father’s demise, Apurva Asrani tweeted, “Goodbye Papa. Every song I sing, I will sing for you. Manohar Asrani 26-10-1951 ~09-01-2023”

Director Hansal Mehta who has collaborated with Apurva on various projects, shared, “Sending you and the family a lot of love Apu. Let the singing never end”

Apurva is also known as award winning editor, he has edited CityLights starring Rajkummar Rao, Mrityunjay Devvrat's Children of War, Viacom 18's 'Dharam Sankat Mein, and Waiting starring Naseeruddin Shah and Kalki Koechlin.

On the work front, Hansal Mehta is currently busy with Faraaz, an action thriller based on actual event, it depicts the Holey Artisan Bakery, July 2016 Dhaka attack that shook Bangladesh.

Produced by T-Series and Benaras Media Works. The film stars Juhi Babbar, Aamir Ali, Pallak Lalwani, Aditya Rawal, Zahan Kapoor, Sachin Lalwani, Jatin Sareen, Ninad Bhatt, Harshal Pawar and Reshham Sahaani.

The film premiered at the BFI London Film Festival on 15 October 2022, and scheduled for release in India on 3 February 2023.

About Newshelpline

News Helpline is a Brand in the world of daily Bollywood Content. We are a team of Innovative, Hard working and Creative people working in media since last 15 years. We were the first to sense the changing phase of News Industry with the progress of IT industry. Hence in the year 2008 we came up with a first of its kind Bollywood News Application, a website where we uploaded Bollywood news on daily basis and our client could download this news from anywhere in the world on the same day of the event. Then with the passage of time we improved and evolved. The result is today our client in any area of the world receives their Bollywood news (HD quality) within 2-3 hrs. post event. The value of News is very Time dependent and we at News Helpline deliver the News before thay become rumors.
